Examples: They'll be home before very long.

Defination: to show something and explain how it works
Examples: And before long many new papers demonstrated that Deep Learning was not only possible

Defination: a feeling of energetic interest in a particular subject or activity and an eagerness to be involved in it
定义: 巨大兴趣；热情；热忱；热心
Examples: This enthusiasm soon extended to many other areas of Machine Learning.

Defination: If you fast-forward a recording, or if it fast-forwards, you make it play at very high speed so that you get to the end or a later part more quickly.
定义: （使）（录音录像设备）快速进带，快进
Examples: Fast-forward 10 years and Machine Learning has conquered the industry.

Defination: to take control or possession of foreign land, or a group of people, by force
Examples: Fast-forward 10 years and Machine Learning has conquered the industry.

Defination: to discover something in the ground
Examples: and more than likely you could unearth some hidden gems if you just knew where to look
Since the problem is not trivial, your program will likely become a long list of com‐ plex rules—pretty hard to maintain.

Defination: the act of watching a person or activity and making certain that everything is done correctly, safely, etc.
Examples: Whether or not they are trained with human supervision

Defination: a standard by which you judge, decide about, or deal with something
定义: （作出评判、决定或处理的）标准，准则
